definitions.title: n. pr. m. 1.
definitions.body: son of Reuel, grandson of Esau Ge 36:13, Ge 36:17 (P; LXX Naxom, Naxoq LXXL Naxeq), 1Ch 1:37 (LXX Naxev, A LXXL Naxeq).

grandson of Elkanah 1Ch 6:11, LXX Kainaq, LXXL Naaq;—prob. crpt. for [[תּוֹחַ]] v:1Ch 6:19, or [[תּׂחוּ]] 1Sa 1:1 (v. these words and We:de gent. 37 f. [who prop. [[תַּחַת]] for [[נַחַת]]], Dr:1Sa 1:1).
an overseer, Hezekian's time 2Ch 31:13, LXX Maeq, A Naeq, LXXL Naaq.
